document.title: Career and Technology Education Standards template

5B66554DFCC742BDAEEA792651B1DB0A.description:
Utilize
appropriate marketing
and sales techniques to
aid consumers in the
selection of goods and
services that meet
consumer needs.

educate an audience
about a new product on
the consumer market.

the labeling, packaging,
and support materials of
consumer goods.

2365E2E8403749BFB518555AAE217FB2.description:

performance of consumer
goods for potential global
impact and trade-offs
among the components.

product.

techniques to aid consumers

services that meet
consumer needs.

Create a
product that contains the
components of a good
design.

93986EC6E36743DA808CE1E290739AD5.description:

to interpret, summarize, and
report data from product

7567BB0EC11A40D5B5F78DC71350F343.description:
Create a

thinking.

techniques.

D9FE7340C4524F12AF7E79AC35634562.description:

products.

and their uses in product
development.

6DBD3861FC5F43E7863FAC41281ABB2D.description:

99AED373082C455E9A95F5B424F8CC3E.description:

recognize its uses in
product development.

378543C1B1634A929820FAAACC34EDB1.description:

needed for product development,

roles of government,
industry, and family in

strategies and practices
to conserve energy and
reduce waste.

local, state, and national
consumer programs and
services, both private and
governmental, to recycle
and conserve energy and
environmental resources.

0256157DB5B64836AA800BC29F05BCA4.description:

types of residential and
commercial energy, water
policy and usage, waste
disposal, and pollution
issues.

40286B61E2544B72B722F6B35411AEE1.description:

that have led to the need for
improved conservation and
waste management policies.

and consequences for the

practices to conserve
energy and reduce waste.

consumer programs and
services, both private and

and conserve energy and

sources of residential and
